title: Define an Enum and Use It
description: Create an OrderStatus enum and an Order model that uses it.
instructions:
Create:

1. An OrderStatus enum with values: pending, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled

2. An Order model with:
   - orderId (String)
   - customerId (int)
   - status (OrderStatus with default pending)
   - totalAmount (double)
   - createdAt (DateTime)
   - shippedAt (DateTime, optional)

Write both YAML definitions.

hints.text: Enum values are listed under 'values:' with each value on a new line starting with -
To use enum as default: status: OrderStatus, default='OrderStatus.pending'

commonMistakes.mistake: Using string value for enum default instead of enum syntax
